chatSystemIHMs

Class ChatGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatSystemIHMs.View
      • chatSystemIHMs.ChatGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FromUser, ToUser, java.util.Observer

    public class ChatGUI
extends View
implements java.util.Observer, ToUser, FromUser
    This class creates and manipulates all the IHMs

    1.0
    Author:
    Alpha DIALLO & Joanna VIGNE
